name: web-component-attribute-polyfill
description: Create a polyfill to allow to have an "attribute" web component (rather a tag web component)

scripts.dev:bump: npm run dev:check && npm run dev:build && node ./scripts/bump.js
scripts.dev:styling: npm run dev:format && npm run dev:linting
scripts.prepare: husky && npx replace-in-file '#!/usr/bin/env sh' '#!/usr/bin/env bash' '.husky/_/husky.sh' --quiet && npx replace-in-file 'sh -e' 'bash -e' '.husky/_/husky.sh' --quiet
